scavenger.name: The Hunt-Morgan House
scavenger.hint: Explore a historic gem in Gratz Park district, which showcases 19th-century architecture and stories of prominent local families

scavenger.name: Lexington's Children Museum
scavenger.hint: This interactive space sparks curiosity with exhibits about science, art, and nature, all designed just for little explorers

scavenger.name: Triangle Park
scavenger.hint: Relax in the heart of downtown Lexington, where fountains, greenery, and outdoor fun meet at this popular park!

scavenger.name: Lexington Farmers Market
scavenger.hint: Find fresh, local produce and artisan goods at the heart of downtown Lexington

scavenger.name: 21c Museum Hotel
scavenger.hint: This hotel is where contemporary art meets boutique luxury

scavenger.name: Bourbon on Rye (pub)
scavenger.hint: Craft cocktails and Southern bites in a vintage Lexington setting

scavenger.name: Ethereal Brewing Public House(fun brewery spot)
scavenger.hint: Enjoy craft brews in a laid-back atmosphere at this Lexington favorite, known for its creative beer selections and cool vibes

scavenger.name: Lexington Public Library
scavenger.hint: Explore a treasure trove of books, programs, and community events at this library

scavenger.name: The Kentucky Theatre
scavenger.hint: Catch a classic film or a live performance at this historic venue, known for its charming ambiance and iconic marquee
